# [Interview #588: Goodreads ToM Fantasy Book Club Q&A with Brandon Sanderson, Entry #16](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=588#16)

#### Lordjuss

Harine (the Sea Folk ambassador) appeared early in
*The Gathering Storm*
but hasn't been seen since. Where was she during
*Towers of Midnight*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Harine has basically been stewing about the fact that she's been blown off.
